Class SpecialDepot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.personalBoard.depots.Depot
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.personalBoard.depots.SpecialDepot
public class SpecialDepot
extends Depot
Special Depot. Consists of a list of SpecialContainers for a specific resource
